abstract: Ballet Nacional de Cuba and country’s National Ballet School, which has produced many world class dancers, have deep roots and promising future as diplomatic relations normalize with United States.

headline.print_headline: Cuban Ballet: Proud Past, Promising Future
headline.main: Cuban Ballet: Proud Past, Promising Future

snippet: The country long-closed dance system may flourish even more with new relationships.
lead_paragraph: The country long-closed dance system may flourish even more with new relationships.
